Package ohos.nfc.tag

Class TagManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.nfc.tag.TagManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IsoDepTag, MifareClassicTag, MifareUltralightTag, NdefTag, NfcATag, NfcBTag, NfcFTag, NfcVTag

    public abstract class TagManager
extends Object
    Controls tag read and write.

    Classes for different types of tags inherit from this abstract class to control connections to tags, read data from tags, and write data to tags.

    Since:
    1

    • Method Detail

      • getTagInfo

        public TagInfo getTagInfo​()
        Obtains the tag information.
        Returns:
        Returns the tag information, which is a TagInfo object.
        Since:
        1

      • connectTag

        public boolean connectTag​()
        Connects to a tag.

        This method must be called before data is read from or written to the tag.

        Returns:
        Returns true if the connection is set up; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • reset

        public void reset​()
        Resets a connection with a tag and restores the default timeout duration for writing data to the tag.
        Since:
        1

      • isTagConnected

        public boolean isTagConnected​()
        Checks whether a connection has been set up with a tag.
        Returns:
        Returns true if a connection has been set up with the tag; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • setSendDataTimeout

        public boolean setSendDataTimeout​(int timeout)
        Sets the timeout duration (ms) for sending data to a tag.

        If data is not sent to the tag within the duration, data sending fails.

        Parameters:
        timeout - Indicates the timeout duration to be set.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the setting is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • getSendDataTimeout

        public int getSendDataTimeout​()
        Queries the timeout duration (ms) for sending data to a tag.
        Returns:
        Returns the timeout duration.
        Since:
        1

      • sendData

        public byte[] sendData​(byte[] data)
        Writes data to a tag.
        Parameters:
        data - Indicates the data to be written to the tag.
        Returns:
        Returns bytes received in response. Or bytes with a length of 0 if the data fails to be written to the tag.
        Since:
        1

      • getMaxSendLength

        public int getMaxSendLength​()
        Queries the maximum length of data that can be sent to a tag.
        Returns:
        Returns the maximum length of the data to be sent to the tag.
        Since:
        1

      • checkConnected

        public void checkConnected​()
        Check whether this tag is connected or not
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if tag is not connected.
        Since:
        3
